forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. Thunder possible. High 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain diminishing to a few showers this afternoon. Thunder possible. High 54F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this evening with clearing overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 60F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
